summary: A re-color of Crimson HD Dragonplate Armor by feuerkorn.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=red]DRAGONPLATE HD RE-COLOR[/color][/b]

[b]ORIGINAL WORK: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3557[/b]

[b][color=red]SUPPORTS CUSTOM MESHES, RECOMMENDED ARMOR PACK:[/color][/b] 
[b]Bingles Buff Armors:[/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6795

A I said in small descr, this is a re-color to feuerkorn\'s Crimson HD retexture mod. My purpose in making this is re-coloring these armor set for matching with theycallmecheese\'s weapon pack, here you can find it here:

[b]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14701[/b]

Also, I recommend Winter is Coming Cloaks mod, they\'re really great (though some variations clips trough armor but ornate ones works well):

[b]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13486[/b]

One last recommend, Expanded Jewelry Crafting:

[b]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8361[/b]

This re-texture applies to both male and female dragonplate armor, and shield of course. Again, thanks to feuerkorn for his original work.

[b]Note:[/b] Actually, \"before\" textures are not vanilla textures because I have official HR texture pack and this pack includes a more detailed version of dragonplate armor. So in without official HR Texture Pack, \"before\" armor texture looks more blurry and undetailed.
author: feuerkorn and TuCoT
